ABOUT_ME_DESCRIPTION: I am a German-speaking Frontend Developer based in Wesel, Germany. Driven by the nearly limitless possibilities that the IT world offers.
ABOUT_ME_LOCATION: I am flexible when it comes to the work location. I can work on-site, from home in a home office, or even fully remote.
ABOUT_ME_PASSION: I have a strong passion for learning new technologies and thrive on tackling challenges by coming up with creative solutions. With a keen eye for detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality work, I continuously seek opportunities to expand my skill set and contribute effectively to projects.
ABOUT_ME_PROFESSION: In my profession, programming isn't just about writing code; it's a creative form of problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to distill complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life.
MY_SKILLS_DESCRIPTION: I have gained experience in building projects with different frontend technologies and concepts.
MY_SKILLS_CONTACT: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.
PORTFOLIO_DESCRIPTION_0: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and catergories
PORTFOLIO_DESCRIPTION_1: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Collect coins and find some bottles to fight against the killer chickens
CONTACT_DESCRIPTION: Contact me through this form. I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas, and contributing to your projects with my work.
CONTACT_PP_AGREE_LAST: and agree to the processing of my data
